description: Updates an impersonation role for the given WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization that contains the impersonation role to update.

parameters.name: ImpersonationRoleId
parameters.description: The ID of the impersonation role to update.

parameters.name: Rules
parameters.description: The updated list of rules. (dict) --- The rules for the given impersonation role. The identifier of the rule. Name (string) --- The rule name. Description (string) --- The rule description. The effect of the rule when it matches the input. Allowed effect values are ALLOW or DENY. TargetUsers (list) --- A list of user IDs that match the rule. (string) --- NotTargetUsers (list) --- A list of user IDs that don't match the rule. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Effect
nested_params.description: The effect of the rule when it matches the input. Allowed effect values are ALLOW or DENY.

nested_params.name: TargetUsers
nested_params.description: A list of user IDs that match the rule.

nested_params.name: NotTargetUsers
nested_params.description: A list of user IDs that don't match the rule.
